dict.string: on alfred_script(q) if {q starts with "$"} then set theCommand to characters 2 thru -1 of q as string do shell script "open -n -a Alacritty.app --args -e " & theCommand & " >/dev/null 2>&1" else do shell script "source /etc/profile; tmux new-window " & (quoted form of q) & " >/dev/null 2>&1" end if end alfred_script
